title: Set math problem solver as default landing page

requirements.summary: Configure the default route to navigate to the math problem solver (/math) instead of the current landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the application URL without any path navigates directly to /math
The MathProblemSolver component loads immediately on app launch
No intermediate landing page or welcome screen is shown

file_operations.description: Update the root route ('/') configuration to redirect to '/math' using TanStack Router's redirect functionality or navigate mechanism, ensuring that when users open the application without a specific path, they are immediately routed to the math problem solver page
